projects.description: Deutsche Bank’s Financial Supply Chain provides financing opportunities and value-added services for all stages of their corporate supply chain. It contributes to improve the working capital management and liquidity generation, lowering cost and enhancing supply chain transparency. It offers further benefits for Target's international trading partners by providing online reporting, tracking and straight forward payment processing worldwide. Major offerings are Supplier finance, Receivable finance & Distributor finance. It’s a one stop services to Target’s buyers, suppliers, insurers, transporters, etc. who are involved in supply chain business.
projects.contribution: Closely work with the product managers & business analysts to understand the FSC requirements and design the solution accordingly. Review the design with the architecture board and develop the solution. Security Architecture review, assessment & remediation. Develop backend modules using Core Java, Hibernate & Spring. Use Java’s concurrent API to develop the functionalities like client data loading, mapping & storage. Define the integration strategy, integration environment requirements, dependencies and the product-component integration sequence. Design & developed the common backend components as a service. Developed seamless bidirectional data integration with Target’s corporate ERP system. Proposed & developed a solution to implement Target ERP integration mapping with a latest mapping product, called Message Broker. This solution saved around $0.7 Million annually. Develop the 2-factor authentication using Smart Cards, VASCO. Develop end to end security using encryption, PKI, 2-way SSL & HSM devices. Use Oracle coherence for caching the data. Use Golden Gate to replicate the data from FSCM & its upstream & downstream interfaces. Enable 2-way SSL on WebLogic by using standard PKI infrastructure. Deploy the solution in a Cloud based architecture. Oversee the load testing & capacity management teams. Platform enhancement to meet the audit & compliance requirements from various regulatory bodies & programs
projects.tools: Core Java, Multi-Threading, Collections, Spring Framework, Spring Security, Spring Data, Spring Batch, Hibernate, JAXB, MyBatis, MQ, JMS, Oracle DB, Golden Gate, Oracle Coherence & Cassandra, J2EE
